name: Yoga Mat
title: Premium Eco-Friendly Yoga Mat
description: This premium yoga mat is made from eco-friendly materials, providing excellent grip and support for your yoga practice. It's lightweight and easy to carry, making it perfect for use at home or in the studio.

name: Essential Oil Diffuser
title: Ultrasonic Aromatherapy Diffuser
description: Create a relaxing atmosphere in your home with this ultrasonic aromatherapy diffuser. Simply add water and your favorite essential oils to enjoy soothing aromas and promote wellness.

name: Protein Powder
title: Organic Plant-Based Protein Powder
description: Fuel your body with clean, organic protein with this plant-based protein powder. Packed with essential amino acids and nutrients, it's perfect for post-workout recovery or as a convenient meal replacement.

name: Foam Roller
title: High-Density Foam Roller
description: Release tension and improve flexibility with this high-density foam roller. Ideal for self-myofascial release and massage therapy, it helps soothe sore muscles and prevent injury.

name: Resistance Bands Set
title: Premium Resistance Bands Set
description: Achieve a full-body workout anywhere with this premium resistance bands set. Made from durable latex, these bands offer varying resistance levels to suit all fitness levels.

name: Herbal Tea Sampler
title: Organic Herbal Tea Sampler
description: Unwind and relax with this organic herbal tea sampler. Featuring a variety of soothing blends, it's perfect for promoting relaxation and overall well-being.
